lead_paragraph: CINCINNATI, Aug. 9 (AP) — David Ross hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning off Jason Isringhausen — Cincinnati’s fourth home run of the game — for an 8-7 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals on Wednesday night that tightened the National League Central race.
